page.title: 18HOUSING & COMMUNITIES SLOUGH
page.content:
Most people do find the areas they live in friendly but they also have complaints about the housing and facilities. In Manor Park they complained about:
{age & poor state of repair of council { housing {poor facilities (outside toilet { bathroom off kitchen) {cramped conditions - gardens not big { enough, no garages between houses {lack of social facilities, especially { for the young & the elderly.
Although most people like their neighbours, problems do occur. Older folk find noise from young children difficult. It is not easy to get to know someone from a different culture.
